<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_oe_sfs.CIAdminConsoleTranslations</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>CIAdminConsoleTranslations</name> <script><![CDATA[var CIAdminConsoleTranslations = Class.create(); CIAdminConsoleTranslations.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
getTranslations: function() { return { "on": gs.getMessage("On"), "off": gs.getMessage("Off"), "activate": gs.getMessage("Activate"), "sensitive_data_detection": gs.getMessage('Sensitive Data Detection'), "inline_message": gs.getMessage('Inline message'), "deflection_configurations": gs.getMessage("Deflection configurations"), "create_deflection_configuration": gs.getMessage("Create Deflection Configuration"), "create_deflection_pattern": gs.getMessage("Create Deflection Pattern"), "deflection_settings_activate": gs.getMessage("Tracking of deflection metrics in Virtual Agent is enabled"), "deflection_settings_deactivate": gs.getMessage("Tracking of deflection metrics in Virtual Agent is disabled"), "deflection_pattern_success": gs.getMessage("Deflection Pattern changes saved successfully"), "deflection_config_success": gs.getMessage("Deflection Configuration changes saved successfully"), "deflection_alert": gs.getMessage("The following mandatory fields are not filled in:\nName"), "chat_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Agent Chat settings saved successfully"), "chat_notification_success": gs.getMessage("Chat client notification settings saved successfully"), "update_failed": gs.getMessage("Something went wrong while updating the settings, please refresh the page"), "agent_chat": gs.getMessage("Agent Chat"), "virtual_agent": gs.getMessage("Virtual Agent"), "general": gs.getMessage("General"), "nlu": gs.getMessage("Natural Language Understanding (NLU)"), "nlu_settings_success": gs.getMessage("NLU settings saved successfully"), "upgrade_alert": gs.getMessage("Please upgrade to access all features. Contact your account executive for more information"), "mandatory_alert": gs.getMessage("Please fill all the mandatory fields"), "icon": gs.getMessage("Icon"), "label": gs.getMessage("Label"), "type": gs.getMessage("Type"), "value": gs.getMessage("Value"), "go_to": gs.getMessage("Go to"), "dismiss": gs.getMessage("Dismiss"), "conversation_history_settings": gs.getMessage("Conversation History Settings"), "conversation_history_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Conversation history settings saved successfully"), "conversation_history_validation_message": gs.getMessage("Value for number of conversations to display should be between 1 to 25"), "collab_chat_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Sidebar settings saved successfully"), "next_experience_link": gs.getMessage("Learn more about Next Experience"), "email_notification_settings_success": gs.getMessage("Email notification settings saved successfully"), "missed_activity_emails": gs.getMessage("Missed activity emails"), "offline_threshold": gs.getMessage("Offline threshold"), "missed_activity_email_subtext": gs.getMessage("Define how and when to email users summaries of chat messages they received while they were offline."), "hours": gs.getMessage("Hours"), "minutes": gs.getMessage("Minutes"), "offline_threshold_label" : gs.getMessage("The amount of time before a user is considered offline"), "invalid_inputs": gs.getMessage("There are fields with invalid input values. Please correct them."), "channels_and_integrations": gs.getMessage("Channels and integrations"), "sidebar_teams_import_user_error" : gs.getMessage("We’ve run into a technical issue. Please verify your API permissions on Azure and try again."), "sidebar_importing_data": gs.getMessage("We’re loading your data. We’ll email you once your integration is ready to use."), "sidebar_integration_success" : gs.getMessage("Success! Your integration is complete"), "sidebar_unknown_error": gs.getMessage("We’ve run into an issue. Please contact technical support for details."), "sidebar_updating_settings": gs.getMessage("Give us a minute to update your settings."), "channel_teams_self_configured_bot_install": gs.getMessage("Integrate Microsoft Teams with self configured bot"), "channel_slack_self_configured_bot_install": gs.getMessage("Integrate Slack with self configured bot"), "channel_messenger_self_configured_bot_install": gs.getMessage("Integrate Messenger with self-configured bot"), "channel_line_self_configured_bot_install": gs.getMessage("Integrate Line with self-configured bot"), "channel_line_self_configured_edit_integration": gs.getMessage("Integrate Line with self-configured bot"), "channel_self_configured_edit_integration": gs.getMessage("Integrate Messenger with self-configured bot"), "manage_messenger_channel": gs.getMessage("Messenger channel"), "manage_line_channel": gs.getMessage("Line channel"), "manage_teams_channel": gs.getMessage("Microsoft Teams channel"), "manage_slack_channel": gs.getMessage("Slack channel"), "manage_workplace_channel": gs.getMessage("Workplace channel"), "configure_teams_bot": gs.getMessage("Configure self-configured bot"), "sidebar_modal_deactivating_teams_integration": gs.getMessage("Deactivating will result in Sidebar discussions no longer being sent to or received by Teams."), "sidebar_modal_updating_setting": gs.getMessage("Updating settings could result in Sidebar discussions no longer being sent to or received by Teams."), "sidebar_modal_button_deactivate": gs.getMessage("Deactivate"), "sidebar_modal_button_update": gs.getMessage("Update"), "sidebar_modal_button_disabled": gs.getMessage("If Sidebar is turned off, Teams integration will also be turned off."), "sidebar_modal_button_enabled": gs.getMessage("If Sidebar is turned on, Teams integration must be manually turned on."), "conversation_consumer_account_context": gs.getMessage("Consumer account context"), "multiple_active_conversations": gs.getMessage("Multiple active conversations"), "multiple_active_conversations_success": gs.getMessage("Multiple active conversations saved successfully"), "consumer_account_context_success": gs.getMessage("New consumer account context saved successfully"), "create_consumer_account_context": gs.getMessage("New consumer account context") }; },
type: 'CIAdminConsoleTranslations' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-13 12:33:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7709589cc3120110fc869bc8a840dd5e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CIAdminConsoleTranslations</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set" source="sn_oe_sfs">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7709589cc3120110fc869bc8a840dd5e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-23 00:23:46</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
